commitResults.messageTitle: feature: Added function for chatbot to echo the user inputs, and to exit the process when 'bye' is input.
feature: Added function to add inputs to a list of tasks. When "list" is input, displays the list of currently input tasks.
feature: Added function to mark and unmark tasks. - Also included exception catch to prevent out of bound searches
Removed commented out lines in Duke.java

Feature: Added more types of tasks. - Todo tasks have no time specification. - Deadline tasks that are to be completed by a certain date. - Event tasks are tasks with a time window to be completed by.
Feature: Added text-ui testing script to test basic functions.
Feature: Added error catching to existing functions to prevent incorrect inputs. - Also updated the test script to include DukeExceptions caught
Feature: Added funtion to delete tasks from task list.
Feature: Add functionality to save tasks to harddrive
Feature: Add ability for chatbot to recognise dates - Able to read input dates in yyyy-mm-dd format and display on list as dd-MMM-yyyy (eg 23 Feb 2023)
